name: @salutejs/plasma-playwright
description: Playwright package for Plasma component testing

scripts.test:b2c: PACKAGE=plasma-b2c COMPONENTS=$npm_config_components playwright test -c playwright-ct.config.ts --project=plasma-b2c $(npm run checkHasUpdate --silent)
scripts.test:web: PACKAGE=plasma-web COMPONENTS=$npm_config_components playwright test -c playwright-ct.config.ts --project=plasma-web $(npm run checkHasUpdate --silent)
scripts.test:insol: PACKAGE=sdds-insol COMPONENTS=$npm_config_components playwright test -c playwright-ct.config.ts --project=sdds-insol $(npm run checkHasUpdate --silent)
scripts.test:cs: PACKAGE=sdds-cs COMPONENTS=$npm_config_components playwright test -c playwright-ct.config.ts --project=sdds-cs $(npm run checkHasUpdate --silent)
